org.placelab.util
Class Logger

java.lang.Object
  org.placelab.util.Logger
public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object

Dead simple logging for debugging text.

You can submit debugging text with 2 levels: Logger.LOW and Logger.HIGH and you can set the system property placelab.Logger.level to OFF, LOW, and HIGH, default is LOW.

You can redirect the logger to a file by setting the placelab.Logger.out to a file of your choice or STDOUT or STDERR. Default is STDOUT.
